name: Calendula Eye Balm

name: Rosehip Cleanser
ingredientsGrouping: Aqua, Sodium Olivate (Fatty Acid from Olive), Glycerin, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Chondrus Crispus, Eriobotrya Japonica Extract

name: Brightening Cleanser

Purified Water, Decyl Glucoside (Veg. Oils & Sugar), Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Coco Glucoside Oleaste (Coconut and Sunflower Oil), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Xanthan Gum, Fragaria Chiloensis Seed Oil (Strawberry), Lycopene, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources).Â

name: Blemish Lotion
ingredientsGrouping: 100 Natural: Purified Water, Isopropyl Alcohol, Colloidal Sulfur, Zinc Oxide, Salicylic Acid, Magnesium, Aluminum Silicate (Clay), Camphor, Iron Oxide

name: Swiss Apple Facial Serum
ingredientsGrouping: Seaweed Extract, Purified Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Phenoxyethanol*, Ethylhexylglycerin*   *Derived from natural sources.

name: Blemish Stick
ingredientsGrouping: Isopropyl Alcohol, Purified Water, Zinc, Sulphate, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Camphor, Witch Hazel, Cellulose Gum, Menthol

name: Squalane Facial Cream
ingredientsGrouping: Aqua, Simmondsia Chinensis, Persea Gratissima, Aloe Barbadensis, Emulsifying Wax, Vegetable Glycerin, Elaeis Guineensis, Palm Stearic Acid, Squalane (olive derived), Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Dl-Panthenol, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Triticum Vulgare, Daucus Carota Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol

name: CoQ-10 Toner
ingredientsGrouping: Purified water (aqua), Aloe Barbadensis, Coenzyme Q10, Hyaluronic Acid, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile), Salvia Officinalis (Sage), Carica Papaya Leaf Extract, Cucums Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources)

name: Hydrating Body Balm
ingredientsGrouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Beeswax, Melissa Officinalis (Lemon Balm) Leaf Extract, Essential Oils of Lavandula Angustifolia, Anthemis Nobilis (chamomile), Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).

name: Clearing Mask
ingredientsGrouping: Purified Water (aqua), Bentonite Clay, Zinc Oxide, Colloidal Sulfur, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Chondrus Crispus (seaweed) Extract, Anthemis Noblis (chamomile) extract, Camphor, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin both derived from natural sources

name: Lemongrass Calendula Body Lotion
ingredientsGrouping: Purified Water (aqua), Glycerine (from Coconut Oil), Stearic Acid (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol (from Palm Oil), Myristyl Myristate (fatty acid), Glycerol Monostearate, Glycine Joja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus (Lemongrass) Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexyglycerin both derived from natural sources

name: Patchouli Sandalwood Moisturizing Oil
ingredientsGrouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Essential Oils of Pogostemon Cablin (patchouli), Santalum Album (sandalwood),  and Cananga Odorata (ylang ylang)

name: Lavender Chamomile Moisturizing Oil
ingredientsGrouping: 100% Natural: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Essential Oils of Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) and Anthemis Nobilis (chamomile).

name: Coconut Citrus Body Scrub
ingredientsGrouping: Saccharum Officinarum (sugarcane), Coco Nucifera (coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Melissa Officinalis (lemon balm), Cymbopogon Citratus (lemongrass) and Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla).

name: Vanilla Citrus Moisturizing Oil
ingredientsGrouping: Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (apricot) Oil, Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla), Citrus Aurantium Sinensis (sweet orange)

name: Unscented Body Lotion
ingredientsGrouping: Purified Water (aqua), Glycerine (from Coconut Oil), Stearic Acid (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol (from Palm Oil), Myristyl Myristate  (fatty acid), Glycerol Monostearate, Glycine Joja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexyglycerin both derived from natural sources

name: Lemongrass Citrus Body Wash
ingredientsGrouping: Aqua, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate (from creatine or caffeine), Xanthan Gum (from glucose, lactose or sucrose), Panthanol (vitamine B5), Xylitol (fruit and vegetable), Oat Flour, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Pure Essential Oil Blend, Biovert (from glucose and lactose)
